text: Michel Corboz (14 February 1934 – 2 September 2021) was a Swiss conductor. He was born in Marsens, Switzerland. In 1961, he founded the Ensemble Vocal de Lausanne. He also worked at the Gulbenkian Choir of Lisbon and taught at the Conservatoire de Musique de Genève. Corboz died on 2 September 2021, aged 87.Décès du chef d'orchestre Michel Corboz ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Swiss musicians Category:Conductors Category:Gruyère District Category:People from the canton of Fribourg
title: Michel Corboz
